verses.text:
I will be pure in heart, Who can de- scend to me,
All will be pure in heart, who loves and serves Thee;
I will be pure in heart, who walks with Thee above,
And keep still pure in heart, in Jesus' wondrous love.

And from temptations free, and from all sin re- leased,
And keep still pure in heart, in Jesus' wondrous love;
They walk with Christ above, where saints and angels are,
And keep still pure in heart, in Jesus' wondrous love.

chorus.text:
The pure in heart shall see God, shall see God,
Shall see God in His beauty;
The pure in heart shall see God, shall see God,
And dwell with Him eternally.
